title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about a ‘breached’ FDA firewall, an AbbVie pricing deal with Trump, and more
description: A veteran FDA regulator who left last month said the firewall between agency political appointees and drug reviewers “has been breached"
content: A veteran FDA regulator who left last month said the firewall between agency political appointees and drug reviewers “has been breached"
